bibl.title: Money in Ptolemaic Egypt. From the Macedonian Conquest to the End of the Third Century BC.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Part I. Money and coinage: 1. The money of the king; - 2. Monetising the countryside. - Part II. Cash and kind: 3. Taxes; - 4. Bronze and silver; - 5. Rents; - 6. Wages. - Part III. Debt and credit: 7. Formal loans; - 8. Extending the credit economy; - 9. Leases and labour contracts; - 10. Credit in a social context. - Part IV. Banking: 11. Banks and the money supply; - 12. Banking and business. - Conclusion. - Appendices. Bibliography. Index of taxes. Index of sources. General index.
